rooms.description: North-facing entrance with wide door and ramp for wheelchair accessibility. Includes a reception area with floor-to-ceiling windows to allow abundant natural light.
Spacious living room adjacent to the central courtyard, featuring floor-to-ceiling windows and Kerala-style wooden carvings. Designed for social gatherings while providing a view of the garden.
Functional kitchen with modern amenities but incorporating traditional Kerala architectural elements. Adjacent to utility area for easy access and ventilation.
Well-designed bathroom with accessibility features and ample natural light from floor-to-ceiling windows on the side facing the garden.

openings.description: A large open space acting as a ventilating and light source, aligning with Vastu principles
